select
from ti_myworkcustomers where PromoterUserId = #{promoteruserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and (CustomerName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) or MobilePhone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) )
order by CreateTime desc
